title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
Reproduce the steps in: 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml in the project.
3. The scripted resource editor example is the default editor for XML files, which ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
5. Choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is still active.
EB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different editor type, such as 'Default Text Editor', it should open a new editor for the selected file because the editor type is different.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml in the project.
3. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
4. Choose 'Open With...
5. Select a different editor type, such as 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that a new editor is opened for the selected file.
